FrageText.de: Was kann die Ursache des Pendelns des Motorrades sein?
FrageText.en: What may be the cause for the motorcycle to swing back and forth?
FrageText.hr: Što može biti uzrok njihanja motocikla?
FrageText.sl: Kaj je lahko vzrok za tresenje motornega kolesa?

en.Text: Bearings play in the chassis components

sl.Text: Preobremenitev zadnjega dela motornega kolesa (Top Case)

tr.Text: Arka tarafta fazla yük bulunması (Top Case)
